issue.title: [CF 114] Feature Request - Raid Targets
issue.body:
I'd like to suggest tracking on raid targets as an option. I like to use this addon to track my Lifebloom on the tanks, but my only viable options at the moment are Target or Focus, since the tanks may or may not be in my party.


> Posted by CurseForge user DoubleDizle | Imported from CurseForge issue #114 | Raw

comments.body:
You would have to change it every time the tank is repositioned in the raid group, so that might get a little annoying. I might add the option to check by name.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
